程序包 org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.metadata

接口 DataSourceMetaData

  • 所有已知实现类:
    H2DataSourceMetaData, MariaDBDataSourceMetaData, MySQLDataSourceMetaData, OpenGaussDataSourceMetaData, OracleDataSourceMetaData, PostgreSQLDataSourceMetaData, SQL92DataSourceMetaData, SQLServerDataSourceMetaData
    public interface DataSourceMetaData
    Data source meta data.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      String getCatalog()
      Get catalog.
      Properties getDefaultQueryProperties()
      Get default query properties.
      String getHostname()
      Get host name.
      int getPort()
      Get port.
      Properties getQueryProperties()
      Get query properties.
      String getSchema()
      Get schema.
      default boolean isInSameDatabaseInstance​(DataSourceMetaData dataSourceMetaData)
      Judge whether two of data sources are in the same database instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isInSameDatabaseInstance

        default boolean isInSameDatabaseInstance​(DataSourceMetaData dataSourceMetaData)
        Judge whether two of data sources are in the same database instance.
        参数:
        dataSourceMetaData - data source meta data
        返回:
        data sources are in the same database instance or not
